entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diff in checked vs. release #98772
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Debugger timeout with deputy thread #98771
    9.0.0
  • Instrument type parameter could be restricted #98763
  • [browser][MT] Assertion: should not be reached at interp/transform.c:9055 #98758
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT failed with VS2022 17.9.0 Professional #98757
  • [API Proposal]: MetadataLoadContext.GetLoadContext(Assembly) #98756
  • [mono] mono_thread_detach hit assert #98751
  • JIT generates incorrect optimised code in .NET 8 #98748
    8.0.x
  • Suspended SystemSetting.exe cause PerformanceCounterCategory exception:System.InvalidOperationException: Category does not exist #98746
  • Tiered JIT changes behavior of code in the absence of explicit conv.r4 #98745
  • Incorrect CFI unwinding information in ARM64 assembly helpers #98738
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose dotnet info by introducing a new hostfxr API #98735
  • Test failure Assert.All() Failure: 12 out of 256 items in the collection did not pass #98732
    9.0.0
  • MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method #98730
    9.0.0

Closed

  • C# Docker container System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Resource temporarily unavailable (<URL>:4003) #98780
  • Changing SSL Certificate Without Closing Connection #98304
  • Reachable assert in ECDiffieHellmanCng #95886
    9.0.0
  • win-x64 SPMI asmdiffs failing #98759
    9.0.0
  • STJ source generator doesn't escape property names #98638
    Future
  • JsonNode.Parse() fails to parse stream containing JSON with a comment #98765
  • [Wasm] Very large methods cause interpreter tiering to fail and allocates a lot of unmanaged memory #93192
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] AdvSimd.Arm64 [Load/Store]Vector64 and [Load/Store]Vector128 for 2,3 and 4 variants with LLVM #93081
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Setting `WasmBuildNative` to false produces no output wasm binary #96863
    9.0.0
  • Unexpected result from evaluated method #96416
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Safe API for covariant cast of ReadOnlySpan<T> #96952
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/12/2024 12:30:28 AM #98708
  • Performance changes related to vzeroupper emit changes #98705
  • C# HttpListener will show ObjectDisposedException if you stop listen after start listen immediately #96705
  • Freeing up memory from ArrayPools #10099
    Future
  • SuperPMI asm diffs and metrics improvement #52877
    Future
  • Package Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection 8.0.0 is not compatible with net80-android #98541
  • [API Proposal]: Why filesystem APIs like `Directory.CreateDirectory`. `DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles`, `File.Create` etc... not `async` #98736
  • Workloads-NoWebcil-Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.DebugLevelTests timeout #98734
  • Consider moving some bits of Emscripten property checks and setup to the WorkloadManifest package. #89482
    9.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #94968
    9.0.0
  • Unhandled exception. System.Exception: Profilee returned exit code 139 instead of expected exit code 100 #98500
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the correct IfaceImpl in TypeMapInfo #98782
  • Remove bash dep from init scripts #98781
  • Enable RLCSE experiment in the perf lab #98779
  • Add info in docs about diagnosing Build Analysis failures #98778
  • JIT: test the new cse policy in jit-experimental #98777
  • JIT: temporarily enable RLCSEGreedy to see how it fares in CI #98776
  • SPMI: Handle PerfScore=0 edge case #98775
  • [NO MERGE] PR benchmark playground v2 #98770
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Don't run net4x tests with Mono on non-Windows #98767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CW_4A #98762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix ValueType.GetHashCode not calling overriden method on nested field #98754
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #98749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors of the struct argument parsing in LoongArch64PassStructInRegister.cs #98744
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [WIP] datas tuning fix #98743
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Optimize the overflow check for `GT_ADD` and `GT_SUB` in emitter::emitInsTernary(). #98742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assertion error for DynamicHelpers::CreateDictionaryLookupHelper(). #98741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Restore erroneously removed encoding of the argument count in a generic method instantiation #98731
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Set Optimize in ILLink analyzer project #98727
    area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • [PERF] Reenable PerfBDN Android testing #98769
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix an infinite loop in eglib. #98774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add runtime-dev-innerloop to Build Analysis tracking #98768
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: refactor CSE to allow running greedy ML heuristic in release #98729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more ZapDisable/ZapRequire references #98569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use MethodInvoker in ReflectionPropertyFetch #98739
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Removing GT_STORE_DYN_BLK, part 1 #98733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null for ECDSA keys from GetECDiffieHellmanPrivateKey #98725
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Fix rich debug info reporting with failed inline contexts #98755
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handle dumping for AOT scenarios #98728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor the generic TensorPrimitives implementation into multiple files. #98566
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Read csv files output by superpmi as UTF8 #98760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix source gen support for custom property names that need escaping #98750
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] cleanup #98672
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Allocate basic block link array in exponential fashion #98701
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize Interlocked.CompareExchange use in Task #93953
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT ARM64_SVE: Add IF_SVE_BR_3A to IF_SVE_EX_3A #98722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement ReadOnlySpan.CastUp #98395
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Add a unified mechanism to track metadata/metrics about the compilation #98653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check if AttributeData for InterfaceTypeAttribute is not null in ConvertComImportToGeneratedComInterfaceAnalyzer #98677
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Fold more casts #98528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify StoreSelectedScalar #98710
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove GenTreeBlk::BlkOpKindHelper #98682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix profiler multiple test #98685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #98726
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • [no merge] Draft: infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add correct ImplementingType and InterfaceImpl to DIM cache in TypeMapInfo #98513
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #98525
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • JIT: Support storing Swift error register value to SwiftError struct #98586
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Bump NuGet.ProjectModel version #98724
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #98551 - Regression in DI scope validation #98661
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Intrinsify ClearWithoutReferences and Fill #98700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter: Place unboxing section along other TEXT sections #97960
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable new exception handling by default #98570
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][mt] Don't allow relink duplicates of `dotnet.native.worker.js` #98487
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [NO-MERGE] Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add back optimization of Encode using arm64 load/store/vectortablelookup #98719
    needs-area-label
  • Privately expose MsQuic performance counters #98422
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Check DivideByZeroException before generating check for unsigned div/mod #98648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Add ProducesNetCoreAssets property to Publishing.props #98665
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update linux musl arm32 helix image to Alpine 3.17 #98531
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Improve alternation switch optimization in regex source generator #98723
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected Build Cache Invalidation #38935

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.3xx] Enable parallel copy in PublishDotnetWatchToRedist #38929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update LocalizableStrings.zh-Hans.xlf #38918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo in VsMsdeploy.cs #38915
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet list package] add an alias option, `-s`, to the option `--source`. #38911
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert Parallel Copy for 8.0.200 #38931
  • Don't copy MSBuild to Container outputs #37315
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #38882
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a Way to Keep GlobalSuppressions.cs Clean #72212
  • Generate a class or type in Visual Studio 2019 #72209
  • Wrap and align call chains - auto formating #72208
  • Don't Show GlobalSuppressions.cs When Supressing Issue #72206
  • Compare files from source generators #72205
  • `OpenProjectAsync` logger's parameter is unused (public API) #72202
  • List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first case of a switch expression #72196
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot `foreach` over a variable passed by `ref` when `GetEnumerator` implemented as a by-ref extension method #72004
    17.10
  • Unable to implement interface event on class with primary constructor and custom event accessors. #72207
  • CS9210 regression in .NET 8.0.200 SDK #72170
  • Compiler freeze with custom assembly attribute #71970
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34620.00 #72198

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable OSX queues #72218
  • Improvements to classification perf with large string literals. #72217
  • Do all parsing work using InProgressState translation actions in the compilation tracker #72215
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState by using ImmutableSegmentedDictionary #72213
  • WIP: Reduce ImmutableDictionary allocations under SolutionCompilationState #72211
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Re-enable GetAsyncEnumerator optional parameter asserts #72204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Fix asserts when emitting calls with optional byref parameters #72203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid using source generators in non-NetCurrent source build #72200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix excessive CPU classify large string literals with tons of embedded classifications in them. #72216
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse syntax trees in parallel when producing initial compilations #72195
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix broken link #72173
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Lock object feature status #72201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type, Next
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add/remove Razor EA IVTs #72186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.9] Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #72181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove obsoleted constructor #72194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72199
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge tuple into a single type representing same values. #72188
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72197
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache frozen solution snapshots at the solution level (not the SolutionCompilationState level). #72193
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove code not used in product #72152
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add missing IClientRequestManager implementation to EA.Xaml #72187
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce string allocations from `GetCategoryBasedDotnetAnalyzerDiagnosticSeverityKey` #72163
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix Introduce Parameter Crash #72191
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Keep as much parsed state as we can when producing frozen compilations #72184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify how frozen partial documents are produced. #72106
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove at most 1 end of line preceding redundant nullable directives #72150
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support UnscopedRef attribute on interface methods and properties #72171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Remove redundant null check when using recursive patterns refactor #72185
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Remove solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Docker container System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: Resource temporarily unavailable (<URL>:4003) #54162
  • "Angular and ASP.NET CORE" default template gives 404 once deployed in IIS #54161
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper #54160
  • Blazor .NET 8 [RenderModeInteractiveAuto] getting an error #54159
  • .NET 8 Blazor - StreamRendering - Magic Pill or Major Headache? #54157
  • Blazor WASM: change way querystring parameters are generated for arrays #54154
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #54148

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54149
  • Blazor: NavigationManager - NavigateTo bug with parameters #52138
    8.0.3
  • Blazor Convention Authorization when pages folder in different assembly #54145
  • OnAfterRender not called on interactive component in loop #54153
  • Request not being aborted after closing the connection is causing high CPU #52564
  • .NET 9 Preview 1 SupplyParameterFromQuery Only Triggers OnParametersSet Once for Repeated Navigations with Same Query String #54091
  • Blazor Web Assembly + Hybrid: HttpClient Upload Progress with ProgressableStreamContent #54105
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #54097
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, updates #54124
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plainTextSansFilter #54140
  • Perf regression: caching #54141
  • Improve server addresses collection debugging #54030
  • Add new enum for Downloads directory to System.Environment.SpecialFolder enum #54146
  • [Blazor] NPE in ExternalLogin.razor in the Blazor Web App with auth template #53221
    9.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't pass nameof to ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #54164
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    community-contribution
  • fixed DefaultProblemDetailsWriter Doesn't Handle Media Type Subsets #52577 #54158
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Manually resolve ref and runtime packs instead of modifying the .NET SDK used in the build #54147
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Improved Server Addresses Collection Debugging #54120
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/8.0] Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53930
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Disable buffering of Blazor streaming responses #53929
    area-blazor
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView ItemTemplate Binding does not always display full string from model #20758
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't build Maps on windows #20753
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI Blazor Android - click on any form element triggers click handler on submit button #20749
  • Feature switches don't work in Debug configuration #20747
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [XamlC] Improve code generated for x:Array #20745
    .NET 9 Planning
  • FilePicker on MacOs (MacCatalyst) returns null #20741
  • Support for latest renderer in Google Map #20740
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] In debug the app is way way slower than in xf #20739
  • The .NET MAUI Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control #20736

Closed

  • Gestures don't work on Label Spans #4734
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [net9.0] Not able to load net9 branch on VS Internal preview can't find libZipSharp #20752
    .NET 9 Planning
  • what is the obfuscator for maui? #20746
  • Microsoft.Maui.FileImageSourceService: Warning: Unable to load image file #20513
  • Custom Font is not fully supported on real Android Device #20744
  • Warning `XC0022` if using `FormattedText` from a `Label` #20633
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Unable to change color of BackButton icon in Shell #11127
    Backlog
  • FontImage glyphs are clipped on Android #16880
  • Excessive Increase in Image File Size Upon Saving in iOS platform #20724
  • Multiple Duplicate Scans Generated in Rapid Succession with Zebra EMDK #17031
  • MenuFlyoutItem Command Bindings and Clicked event no longer work on MacCatalyst #20737

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Handle ConnectionProfiles exception #20757
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, potential-regression
  • [ci] Update azdo BuildNumber #20751
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix usage of feature switches in Debug mode #20748

Merged

  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
  • [X] Traverse ListNode when finding DataType #20742

Updated

  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why is Package Manager trying to suggest incompatible updates? #33135
  • Cosmos - Inheritance through abstract class fails to load when searching by Find or through explicit load statements #33134
  • SQLite Error 5: 'database is locked'. - Is this Sqlite error code 5 (busy) or 6 (locked)? What causes it? #33133
  • Adjust DB context generation from DB #33131
  • Migrations command in incorrect order when dealing with sequences #33130
  • Exception when using ComplexProperty on entity that's mapped to a Table-Valued function or a View #33129

Closed

  • An issue with EF Core Recursive Updates on Unchanged Entities across Different DbContext Instances #33122
  • Q: HasConversion Overloads and confusing behavior #33102
  • dotnet ef tools 8.0.2 not compatible with .Net SDK 8.0.101? #33092
  • Docker + "The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App.WindowsForms' was not recognized" on v8.0.2 #33088
  • Access to a collection on an entity in Added state with lazy loading enabled #33079
  • Polymorph entity (TPH) with select-mapping and FirstOrDefault - could not be translated #33069
  • EF Core 8.0.1 regression: an entity with a primary key in another collation returns invalid results for trivial queries. #33040
  • Owned type's shadow key size should match that of owner's PK #33037
  • Ignored/Removed Indexes are still created in GenerateCreateScript #33007
  • Entity Framework Core in Visual Studio 2022 Migrations freezes (hangs) during migrations (example Add-Migration) #32998
  • Ephemeral/Shadow navigation properties or other mechanism of automatic joins. #32658
  • Migrate separate Sqlite in-memory database fails #33128

PullRequests

Created

  • Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33132

Updated

  • Rewrite the funcletizer to support precompiled queries #33106

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18740

  • Add VMR support for Windows-x64 PGO Instrumented leg #18672
